title: security orchestration
extract: Security orchestration is making different products (both security and non-security) integrate with each other and automating tasks across products through workflows, while also allowing for end user oversight and interaction. Security automation is a subset of security orchestration.
extract_html: Security orchestration is making different products (both security and non-security) integrate with each other and automating tasks across products through workflows, while also allowing for end user oversight and interaction. Security automation is a subset of security orchestration.
